items.sentence: I completely forgot to make something for us to eat.
I\'m not going out because I have to do my homework.
I\'ve got a friend who works for the New York Times.
Tom didn\'t eat pizza with the rest of us yesterday.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to buy Mary a present.
This is one of the most popular restaurants in town.
This is the kind of program that Tom likes to watch.
This is the last message I ever plan to send to you.
Tom and Mary sat in front of the TV, eating popcorn.
I thought that you were planning on going to Boston.
